raw_body: It is with deep sorrow that we announce the peaceful passing of Mrs. P. Benedict Imiarachchi on 6th of November, loving wife of late I. A. D. Benedict, mother of Ranjith Laksiri, Nimal Lakshman, Donald Malintha & Nirmalie Damayanthy, Mother-in-law of Geethi & Rev. Chandana Sumith, Grandmother of Sujan,
